NEWS

Monday 11th March 2019
  • New CCTV cameras to be operational by August
    Description
    Forty-five new CCTV cameras and two rapid deployment cameras are set to be installed in Leigh town centre thanks to Wigan Council's #BelieveInLeigh fund.
Thursday 7th March 2019
  • Wigan Borough schools to get £1m for extra activities thanks to The Deal
    Description
    A £1m fund for schools in Wigan Borough to provide extra activities for their pupils has been unveiled by Wigan Council's leader.
